name: Worshiper
description:
You have been chosen to worship Omni Star!

Follow his instructions and you will be safe, fail your one and simple task and you will be gone forever. Remember there will be an opening to escape you just need to wait patiently, and then for sure, maybe you possibly will be free. 

Game features over 200+ dialog lines.
Main plot will take you about 10 min and roughly 25 mins to unlock all dialog options.

Music used in game do not belong to me. It's soundtrack from movie Master And Margarita "Woland Soundtrack Theme" by Igor Kornelyuk
